entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Barrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:11 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 12:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
Temperature: 4.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 4.8°C
Wind: SSW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches developing near midnight. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. High plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
